# g-button

This is the button component used for interaction. It has multiple states, using Slots for iconography and Props for theming.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description              | Type                                                | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------ | --------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `theme`  | `theme`   | The theme of the button. | `"naked" \| "outlined" \| "primary" \| "secondary"` | `undefined` |


## Slots

| Slot           | Description                                            |
| -------------- | ------------------------------------------------------ |
|                | The button text.                                       |
| `"icon-end"`   | For adding an icon to the right.                       |
| `"icon-only"`  | Used when a button only contains an icon with no text. |
| `"icon-start"` | For adding an icon to the left.                        |


----------------------------------------------

*Built with [StencilJS](https://stenciljs.com/)*
